conversations.conversation:
everyone might think I have a lot of friends but who knows they just look for me when their best friends doesn't have next to them.. I was just a stopover for those who want someone accompanying them.
;Just like Faizal Tahir's song....
;siapa sebenarnya aku padamu
;mungkin sama dengan teman lain
;yang bisa kau buat begitu
;dan bila
;tiada lagi teman bermain
;kau pulang mendapatkan aku
;itulah aku padamu
